body: Once per day as a swift action, you can lose a single 1st-, 2nd- or 3rd-level magus spell to regain 1 arcane pool point. You can't exceed the maximum number of arcane pool points in your arcane pool by using this trait.
name: Malleable Magic
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Magic Traits/Malleable Magic
